{{Wired embedded system |brand=Gateworks |model=Ventana GW5200 |revision= |est_release_date=07/2013 |manuf_country=USA |is_manuf=Yes |type=single-board computer, wired embedded board |pwr_v=8-60 |pwr_conn=barrel |pwr_barrel_outer=5.5 |pwr_barrel_inner=2.5 |pwr_barrel_len=9.5 |pwr_poe=af |cpu1_brand=Freescale (NXP) |cpu1_model=i.MX6 |cpu1_cspeed=800 |cpu1_cores=2 |fla1=256 |fla1_brand=Micron |fla1_model=MT29F2G08ABAEAH4-IT:E |ram1=512 |ram1_brand=Winbond |ram1_model=W632GG6KB12I |ram1_num=2 |expansion_if_types=USB 2.0, Mini PCIe, |expansion_minipcie_num=2 |expansion_usb_num=1 |jtag=yes,, 10-pin header,, populated,, J12 |serial=yes,, 5-pin header,, populated,, J10 |eth_cpu=true |eth_chip2_brand=Marvell |eth_chip2_model=88E1510 |lan_speed=1GbE |lan_ports=1 |addl_chips=GPS Module;Wi2Wi;W2SG0008i;;1;,,, Low Power Stereo Codec;NXP;SGTL5000;;1;,,, Mixed-Signal Microcontroller;TI;MSP430F2252;;1;,,, 10-bit 4Ã— Oversampling SDTV Video Decoder;Analog Devices;ADV7180;;1;,,, 6-axis Sensor w/ Accelerometer and Magnetometer;NXP;FXOS8700CQ;;1;,,, 3.3V 2 Channel Multiplexer/Demultiplexer Switch;NXP;CBTL02042A;;1;,,, 4-lane, 4-port PCIe Gen2 Switch;PLX Technology;PEX8604;;1;,,, 3V - 5.5V Multichannel RS232 Line Driver;TI;MAX3223E;;1;,,, Stand-Alone CAN 2.0B Controller;Microchip;MCP25625;;1;,,, Wide Range Synchronous Buck Controller;TI;LM5116;;1;,,, PMIC;Linear Technology;LTC3676;;1; |flags=MicroSD Card slot, MiniSIM Card slot, Micro HDMI 1.4, CAN Bus, GPIO, I2C, RTC w/ battery backup, LVDS, Accelerometer, GPS receiver, |stock_boot=U-Boot;2013.07; |stock_os=Linux;3.14.48;Yocto 2.3; |tp_firmware=OpenWrt, Android 4.3, Android 5.1, Ubuntu 18.04, Windows Embedded }} {{TagLine|Ventana GW5200 Single Board Computer}} :[https://www.gateworks.com/products/imx6-single-board-computer-gateworks-ventana-family/gw5200-single-board-computer/ Product page] {{See also|List of Single-board computers}} ===Specifications=== :per '''Gateworks''''s site, follow... *CPU: [[NXP]] i.MX6 @800MHz Dual Core (ARM Cortex-A9) *RAM: 512 MB (DDR3-1066) SDRAM Memory *Flash: 256 MB System Memory :Micro SD Flash Expansion Socket *Two High-Power Gen 2.0 Mini PCIe Sockets :One Mini-PCIe Socket Supports an optional GSM11-11 SIM Socket :One Mini-PCIe Socket supports an mSATA disk drive :(only available with optional Quad-core processor) :One Mini-PCIe Socket Supports Both PCIe and USB *'''Ports:''' LAN: 1x GbE Ethernet Port :*USB: 1x USB 2.0 OTG Port (up to 480Mbps) :*HDMI 1.4 Output Port with Audio Support :*RS232 Serial Port, CAN 2.0B (1Mbps) Serial Port :*General Purpose Digital I/O and I2C Expansion Port *Analog Stereo Headphone/Mic or Line In/Out Audio *Real Time Clock with Battery Backup *Dimensions: [[Dimensions::70 mm x 100 mm x 13 mm]] 
	    Standard Configuration Models
	GW5200				GW5204
i.MX6 Dual Core CPU @800MHz	i.MX6 Quad Core CPU @1.0GHz
512 MB DDR3 DRAM		1 GB DDR3 DRAM
256 MB Flash			2 GB Flash
				GPS
